version_description:
Updated Ale Trail Prizes
some bugfixes
iPhone 6 support

Sorry everyone - there was a totally unexpected issue with the update that made the app crash for everyone who loaded the update. This version fixes the issue. Thanks for your patience..
+ iPhone 6 support
+ new AleTrail prizes announced
We worked hard to get them ready: Try the new Pump Clip Scanner and the beer and pubs share feature
Improvement of pump clip scanning feature.

* load beer pump clips dynamically - this reduced the app size a lot!
* minor updates

What’s New
- Redesigned user interface
- Quick access to main features
- Improved pump clip scanner accuracy
- Ale trails from our corporate partners
- Tasting notes for all beer styles, not just cask
- Ratings & favourites stored in the cloud, not in-phone
- Change password feature
- Regular beer news

fixed some bugs and improved user experience

What’s New
- Redesigned user interface
- Quick access to main features
- Improved pump clip scanner accuracy
- Ale trails from our corporate partners
- Tasting notes for all beer styles, not just cask
- Ratings & favourites stored in the cloud, not in-phone
- Change password feature
- Regular beer news

* fixed bug not showing favorite beers and pubs
* fixed issue on small iPhones with pump clip scanner - photo could not be selected

* Scan QR codes from the start page already
* if you select the map view for finding pubs, we remember this now for the next startup
* The ale trail map lets you see your location now as well
* if you don't allow camera access, you get a proper error message now

Fixed beer updates
some small improvements
